name: StackOverflow - Black header
description: Did you like the old slim black header? Does the new one annoy you? Then try this style and enjoy modern, yet still similar nav bar that we all got used to.
additional_info:
Based on code from reinderbrouwer which can be found here: http://pastebin.com/VhADqn5p

I made it even smaller and changed it back to the original color.

If you wish to disable stickiness, you can do it in your preferences here: http://stackoverflow.com/users/preferences/

---------------------------------------------

1.0.6 - Fixed some issues (new search button), used new b/w logo and disabled this style for stackoverflow.blog
1.0.5 - Fixed the space between the header and the content
1.0.4 - Fixed the logo on Meta Stack Overflow site
1.0.3 - Fixed - SO renamed the header class from .so-header to .top-bar
1.0.2 - Fixed the header being 3px taller than it should have been.
1.0.1 - Fixed the problem with full logo when you're not logged in (now it always uses only small glyph). Also login button is now a bit more pronounced.
